name: abseiled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
abseil
to go down a very steep slope by holding on to a rope that is fastened to the top of the slope: She abseiled down the rock face. I was a little scared when I first abseiled.
More examplesFewer examplesNone of the group had ever abseiled before.You can abseil, kayak, surf, or cycle here.All he needed to do was abseil a few feet to safety.
